page.title: 05Continuation of Staverton
page.content:
Now the houses are so expensive. It is only families who are moving into the village who can afford to buy them. There are no homes for those with young children or those people getting married. Many young Staverton people have had to move to Daventry to live.
To sum up, Staverton seems a very quiet sleepy place, with not much going on.Nearlyall the people work outside the village and they go for their entertainment elsewhere. Staverton is a village with an ageing population. One of the main points is that Staverton is so near to Daventry that people can go to town for all their needs and do not require much from the village except their house. Even the church is very quiet with no real organisation.
